arm_group.arm_group_label: Extracorporeal CO2 elimination by ILA Activve(R)

brief_summary.textblock:
Oxygenatuion and decarboxylation during different settings (steps of blood flow and sweep
      gas flow) of extracorporeal gas exchange by ILA Activve using a jugular 22French double
      lumen cannula are measured.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patient on ILA Activve

          -  Controlled mechanical ventilation

          -  No spontaneous breathing

        Exclusion Criteria:

        - Pregnancy

intervention.arm_group_label: Extracorporeal CO2 elimination by ILA Activve(R)
intervention.intervention_name: Change of blood flow or sweep gas flow ( ILA Activve)

facility.name: Dept. of Medicine I, ICU, General Hospital of Vienna

clinical_study.official_title: Efficiency of Gas Exchange Using a Miniaturized Pump Driven Veno-venous Extracorporeal Gas Exchange Device (ILA-Activve)

oversight_info.authority: Austria: Austrian Medicines and Medical Devices Agency

primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes after every 15 min. of each setting (13 settings leading to 195 min. altogether)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
